"All Special Ability Transfer":
"The Item Lab's \"All Special Ability Transfer\" function allows you to transfer all Special Abilities from one piece of equipment to another.

※Requires N-Special Ability Transfer Pass, N-Meseta, and a Material Item.
※A Material Item is any weapon/armor whose Special Ability Slot count is the same as, or lower than, the Base Item's." text0002#0,"When performing a Transfer
column3: all of the Base Item's Special Abilities will be replaced with the Material Item's Special Abilities
column4:
and the Material Item's Special Abilities will be lost.

※Some items
column6: do not require the use of an N-Special Ability Transfer Pass when used as a Material Item."""
